repatriation.description: Data is said to be repatriated when it is published by an institution in one country but relates to biodiversity occurring in another country

isClustered.description: This experimental feature highlights possible duplicate and/or related occurrences.

isSequenced.description: Has either DNA-derived data extension or associatedSequences

occurrenceStatus.description: 'Absent' is applied to an occurrence record when a survey of a taxon at a specific time and place encounters no specimens

location.includeFlaggedAsSuspicious: Include records where coordinates are flagged as suspicious
location.onlyShowFlagged: Only show records that are flagged as suspicious
location.tooLargeSuggestion: Try to use a bounding box and filter locally instead
location.aboutWktAndGeoJson: Only WKT is supported, but we will attempt to convert any GeoJSON to WKT. If you have a large GeoJSON file or a Shape file, you can simplify it using [MapShaper](http://mapshaper.org/) and convert to WKT using [geojson.io](http://geojson.io/). Notice that only POINT, LINESTRING, LINEARRING, POLYGON and MULTIPOLYGON are accepted WKT types.
location.simplificationWarning: We can try to simplify the geometry, but this might lead to self-intersections or otherwise invalid geometries. In that case you need to correct the geometry manually or simplify the initial geometry.
